meta.title: OptionPut - Models - API Reference
meta.description: The model for a PUT to update options on a product.

blocks.data: The model for a PUT to update options on a product.

id.description: The unique numerical ID of the option, increments sequentially.

product_id.description: The unique numerical ID of the product to which the option belongs.

display_name.description: The name of the option shown on the storefront.

type.description: The type of option, which determines how it will display on the storefront. Acceptable values: `radio_buttons`, `rectangles`, `dropdown`, `product_list`, `product_list_with_images`, `swatch`. For reference, the former v2 API values are: RB = radio_buttons, RT = rectangles, S = dropdown, P = product_list, PI = product_list_with_images, CS = swatch.

default_value.description: (date, text, multi_line_text, numbers_only_text) The default value. Shown on a date option as an ISO-8601â€“formatted string, or on a text option as a string.

checked_by_default.description: (checkbox) Flag for setting the checkbox to be checked by default.

checkbox_label.description: (checkbox) Label displayed for the checkbox option.

date_limited.description: (date) Flag to limit the dates allowed to be entered on a date option.

date_limit_mode.description: (date) The type of limit that is allowed to be entered on a date option.

date_earliest_value.description: (date) The earliest date allowed to be entered on the date option, as an ISO-8601 formatted string.

date_latest_value.description: (date) The latest date allowed to be entered on the date option, as an ISO-8601 formatted string.

file_types_mode.description: (file) The kind of restriction on the file types that can be uploaded with a file upload option. Values: `specific` - restricts uploads to particular file types; `all` - allows all file types.

file_types_supported.description:
(file) The type of files allowed to be uploaded if the `file_type_option` is set to `specific`. Values:
  `images` - Allows upload of image MIME types (`bmp`, `gif`, `jpg`, `jpeg`, `jpe`, `jif`, `jfif`, `jfi`, `png`, `wbmp`, `xbm`, `tiff`). `documents` - Allows upload of document MIME types (`txt`, `pdf`, `rtf`, `doc`, `docx`, `xls`, `xlsx`, `accdb`, `mdb`, `one`, `pps`, `ppsx`, `ppt`, `pptx`, `pub`, `odt`, `ods`, `odp`, `odg`, `odf`).
  `other` - Allows file types defined in the `file_types_other` array.

file_types_other.description: (file) A list of other file types allowed with the file upload option.

file_max_size.description: (file) The maximum size for a file that can be used with the file upload option.

text_characters_limited.description: (text, multi_line_text) Flag to validate the length of a text or multi-line text input.

text_min_length.description: (text, multi_line_text) The minimum length allowed for a text or multi-line text option.

text_max_length.description: (text, multi_line_text) The maximum length allowed for a text or multi line text option.

text_lines_limited.description: (multi_line_text) Flag to validate the maximum number of lines allowed on a multi-line text input.

text_max_lines.description: (multi_line_text) The maximum number of lines allowed on a multi-line text input.

number_limited.description: (numbers_only_text) Flag to limit the value of a number option.

number_limit_mode.description: (numbers_only_text) The type of limit on values entered for a number option.

number_lowest_value.description: (numbers_only_text) The lowest allowed value for a number option if `number_limited` is true.

number_highest_value.description: (numbers_only_text) The highest allowed value for a number option if `number_limited` is true.

number_integers_only.description: (numbers_only_text) Flag to limit the input on a number option to whole numbers only.

product_list_adjusts_inventory.description: (product_list, product_list_with_images) Flag for automatically adjusting inventory on a product included in the list.

product_list_adjusts_pricing.description: (product_list, product_list_with_images) Flag to add the optional product's price to the main product's price.

product_list_shipping_calc.description: (product_list, product_list_with_images) How to factor the optional product's weight and package dimensions into the shipping quote. Values: `none` - don't adjust; `weight` - use shipping weight only; `package` - use weight and dimensions.

is_default.description: The flag for preselecting a value as the default on the storefront. This field is not supported for swatch options/modifiers.

label.description: The text display identifying the value on the storefront.

sort_order.description: The order in which the value will be displayed on the product page.

value_data.description: Extra data describing the value, based on the type of option or modifier with which the value is associated. The `swatch` type option can accept an array of `colors`, with up to three hexidecimal color keys; or an `image_url`, which is a full image URL path including protocol. The `product list` type option requires a `product_id`. The `checkbox` type option requires a boolean flag, called `checked_value`, to determine which value is considered to be the checked state.

id.description: The unique numeric ID of the value; increments sequentially.
